org.pojoxml.util
Class ClassUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.pojoxml.util.ClassUtil

public abstract class ClassUtil
extends java.lang.Object

ClassUtil is a utility class for invoking the Given POJO methods. using the reflection API. This class will class will handle all reflection API.

Since:
1.0
Author:
SreeHari
